name: 90 Minute Fever - Football (Soccer) Manager MMO
description: 90 Minute Fever is an accessible yet deep skill-based football management MMO. Create and customise your own club, sign players & staff, compete against a community of highly active managers in a persistent online world and build your own legacy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7(SP1+)/10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Pentium 4 / AMD Athlon 64 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7(SP1+)/10 Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1920 x 1080 Resolution DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
